game.name: Ecliptic
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Ecliptic is a 3D Puzzle Adventure Game set in the Stars! Inspired by the mythological figures of the horoscope, embark on the hero's journey with the mysterious protagonist on a journey of identity and discovery.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ecliptic is a 3D Puzzle Adventure Game set in the Stars! Inspired by the mythological figures of the horoscope, embark on the hero's journey with the mysterious protagonist on a journey of identity and discovery.
